column4: hello  i have installed ubuntu 9.10   and i need help with networking
no.  not from my new ubuntu 9.10 install
can you ping your routers internal ip?
i am sshed into the 192.168.0.1 box and irc'ing from there to you.
if you run: ifconfig.  Can you pastebin the output please
i can't pastebin from the 9.10 box   i would need gpm installed to do that and can't install anything until i get the network fixed
output the text to a file. Then copy to a web active system
i might redirrect it to a file and scp it to the gateway then post it.
Trek: are the metrics meant to be all zero?
i'd look into the metric bit. I'm not at home on my g1 phone so cannot confirm zero metrics as ok. Maybe someone else can verify. Doesn't look right to me though
a quick idea of how i'm wired here.    inet--dialup_modem-192.168.0.1-eth0---eth2-192.168.0.6         if that helps any
yes metric's all 0 on gateway also   so that's not a problem.
ummm but i may need to turn on ipv4 forwarding  somewhere ?
sure if the connecting system is a pc
ok, i'll go work on this a while,  i'll let you know if i can't get it worked out.  ;/
